mapper.select: SELECT id, title, nickname, update_date, COALESCE(reply_count, 0) as reply_count FROM baseboardlist l LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT post_id, count(post_id) as reply_count FROM baseboardreplylist GROUP BY post_id) r ON l.id = r.post_id ORDER BY l.update_date DESC OFFSET #{offset} LIMIT #{listCnt};
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT id FROM baseboardlist WHERE id = #{id})
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT reply_id FROM baseboardReplylist WHERE reply_id = #{parentId})
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT password FROM baseboardlist WHERE id = #{id} AND password = #{password})
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT password FROM baseboardreplylist WHERE reply_id = #{replyId} AND password = #{password})
SELECT parent_true_false FROM baseboardreplylist WHERE reply_id = #{replyId}
INSERT INTO baseboardlist (nickname, password, title, content, update_date) VALUES (#{nickName}, #{password}, #{title}, #{content}, now()) RETURNING id;

select.if: INSERT INTO baseboardreplylist (post_id, parent_id, parent_true_false, content, nickname, password, update_date) VALUES (#{postId}, #{parentId}, false, #{content}, #{nickname}, #{password}, now()) RETURNING reply_id;
INSERT INTO baseboardreplylist (post_id, parent_true_false, content, nickname, password, update_date) VALUES (#{postId}, true, #{content}, #{nickname}, #{password}, now()) RETURNING reply_id;

mapper.update: UPDATE baseboardlist SET password = #{password}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_date = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE baseboardreplylist SET password = #{password}, content = #{content}, update_date = now() WHERE reply_id = #{replyId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM baseboardlist WHERE id = #{id} AND password = #{password}
